column2: 35-44 Female  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Patient)
column9: This medication works but be careful. Because I was eating less food I wasn't replenishing my vitamins and minerals as quick as I was burning through them. I ended up being hospitalized overnight because I started having symptoms for very low potassium and calcium which can cause heart arrhythmia among other things.I also experienced restlessness and rapid heartbeat while on it.

column9: i only have been on it for 3 days, but basically I dont even care about food any more, I love that part. But i do feel a bit shaky, my heart beat seems stronger, and sleep is not high on my list. but I feel much thinner. will weigh in soon, hopefully with good results. oh yeah dry mouth toosu

column2: mccray35453, 35-44 Female  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Patient)
column9: I do not know what's wrong with my system.  But I have noticed that the medication isn't working for me at all.  The ease of use, was simple. I have not felt the "effectiveness", even when I paid close attention to what I was feeling in my stomach.  Regardless how I had taken the medicine, it wasn't working for me. I had to struggle to not to over eat, that was harder than exercise.

column9: I have only been using this medicine for a couple of days and so far seems to be working except for my legs itching which I am not sure is related to the medicine.

column9: this treatment is awsome.  I love drugs.

column2: Chason, 35-44 Male  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Patient)
column9: This drug is pretty amazing. I went from 218 lbs to 190 lbs in 7 weeks. It slashed my appetite so I just eat once a day most of the time. I definitely am having some side effects including the shakes, aggression, strong heart beats , and increased sex drive.

column2: wmyers32, 45-54 Male  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Patient)
column9: This has been a miracle drug for me. In the first 27 days of use, I lost 20lbs. with no side effects. It helped decrease my appetite and provided me with loads of energy.

column2: kate, 45-54 Female  on Treatment for 1 to less than 2 years (Patient)
column9: this worked great for me while I was on it.  However, since I've been off, I've gained all my weight back.  It's very discouraging.  I want to take it again, but the more I read about it the less likely I am to go back on it.  I was on this for almost 2 years and everything I've said states no long term use.  I'm concerned about long term affects of this.

column2: 35-44 Female  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Patient)
column9: I have been using bontril for 6 weeks and lost 11 pounds. I have tons of energy and love the way I feel on this drug.I can't wait to loose more.

column2: 19-24 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: This pill has only made me hungrier. I was previously on Adipex and Topamax for weight loss and lost 52 pounds. But now that i'm on Bontril I feel like Im only going to gain it back =[

column2: dollyspot, 25-34 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Caregiver)
column9: well I have been on all of the diet medications and I am immune to all of them.  Phen/fen was the only one that worked,so I figure I could handle this one.  After 3 weeks of being on it, my blood pressure sky rocketed and I am dizzy beyond belief.  So I stopped the medication and will see next week if I need to follow up with a cardiologist.

column2: Ava, 19-24 Female  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Patient)
column9: I have been taking Bontril for 6 weeks now and it has been wonderful! I have lost 12 lbs so far and looking forward to dropping more. I have plenty of energy throughout the day but no jitters. The only problem I have with it is my sex drive has diminished quite a bit.

column2: 25-34 Female  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Patient)
column9: I finally found a medication to help me loose my weight i lost 70 lb. now after i have finished taking it i have a heart palpatation and recieving treatment for it and also well on it had a anxiety feeling all the time. Yes it help me lose weight and now i can run with my children but i now have to deal with my heart palpaltation.

column2: 19-24 Female  on Treatment for 6 months to less than 1 year (Patient)
column9: This was my miracle drug. For the first time in my life, that part of my brain that kept telling me I was hungry after having just eaten final stopped. However, the first time I took one dose, I was awake for two days and nights. It caused constant feelings of anxiety and I started getting heart palpitations, but I considered that a small price for the 20 pounds I lost. However, I have not taken this medication for over a year and I still have those palpitations which I now have to take medication to control.
